citation: Department of Health Care Access and Information Discharge Data, 2019-2022; Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality (AHRQ) Patient Safety Indicators, SAS Software.
description: The dataset contains in-hospital postoperative sepsis cases, elective surgical discharges, risk-adjusted sepsis rates, and performance ratings for California hospitals. This dataset does not include sepsis acquired in outpatient settings.
keywords: agency for healthcare research and quality
name: postoperative-sepsis-outcomes-for-elective-surgeries-in-california-hospitals
related_resources: http://www.qualityindicators.ahrq.gov/ This information is provided as a courtesy. The State does not control any third party web services or any of the material on their sites.
